 2008-10152008-06-05ND,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisOrder amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to implement relevant recommendations from the Lamer Report that do not require changes to the National Defence Act and improve the operation and fairness of the military justice system.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to implement relevant recommendations from the Lamer Report that do not require changes to the National Defence Act and improve the operation and fairness of the military justice system.
